Title: The War Room
Actors: James Carville, George Stephanopoulos, Heather Beckel, Paul Begala
Plot: A behind-the-scenes documentary about the Clinton for President campaign, focusing on the adventures of spin doctors James Carville and George Stephanopoulos. Bill Clinton himself is almost never seen.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 6 wins & 2 nominations.
